channel.title: ComplexityRSPS- INSTANT PKING
channel.description:
[center][url=http://complexityrsps.com]Website[/url] [url=http://complexityrsps.com/webclient.html]Play Now[/url] [url=http://complexityrsps.com/ComplexityRSPS.zip]Download[/url]
Features: -PK point system (had to say the most obvious thing) -No OP stuff (everyone pk at matched gear basically so there is not 'prodding' 24 7) -Decent item switches -Fight Caves ( kill jad get kiln)
[b]Vote System[/b] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/mysteryyyyy.png[/img] ComplexityRSPS has a very basic vote system which gives the player who has voted a Mystery Box. This Mystery Box, when opened gives the player a number of random items. A few examples of the random items are: Troll Bones (Worst reward) Boots (Give good bonuses) Camel Mask (same as boots) Dragon Defender Sara Swords and SOL Onyx Necklaces AND MORE!
[img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/1.1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/8.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/114171522/Complexity%20pictures/9.png[/img]
Cya online[/center]

item.title: ComplexityRSPS- INSTANT PKING
item.dc:creator: @Muhamed1 Muhamed1
item.description:
@Muhamed1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:10, topic:520530”][quote author=Muhamed1 link=topic=639026.msg4309692#msg4309692 date=1370541045]

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=639026.msg4309028#msg4309028 date=1370438047]

Oldschool didn’t have the Tokhaar-kal.

The name is supposed to be - ComplexityRSPS - BASIC PKing server, also stop judging about something when your servers are deathlypvpz leeches.

My servers? I’ve only ever owned one server, which is FroznFury. But I’ve also had a few other releases. Search up who I am before assuming because you will make a complete ass out of yourself, I guarantee you that.
[/quote]lol @ elvin being accused of using deathlypvp leech… xD

FrozenFury came out BEFORE trisidia/deathplvp even…

FrozenFuy has worse code then deathlypvpz rofl.
yet you should try to stay ontopic. you came to say that on a advertisement thread. should aswell just getoff this thread.
[/quote]what exactly is there to say on this thread?

you are loading higher revision content on a 317 server…you have barrows in a store thus no real challenge for players to look forwards to unless I assume they donate. It’s purely donator base. Are you happy I said it now?[/quote]

it’s a PKing server, why should there be a challenge to get basic stuff for PKing?

Read full topic

item.title: ComplexityRSPS- INSTANT PKING
item.dc:creator: @magpkz magpkz
item.description:
@magpkz wrote:

[center]Website
Play Now
Download

Features:
-PK point system (had to say the most obvious thing)
-No OP stuff (everyone pk at matched gear basically so there is not ‘prodding’ 24 7)
-Decent item switches
-Fight Caves ( kill jad get kiln)

Vote System

ComplexityRSPS has a very basic vote system which gives the player who has voted a Mystery Box. This Mystery Box, when opened gives the player a number of random items.
A few examples of the random items are:
Troll Bones (Worst reward)
Boots (Give good bonuses)
Camel Mask (same as boots)
Dragon Defender
Sara Swords and SOL
Onyx Necklaces
AND MORE!










Cya online[/center]

Read full topic
